## RelationInclude interface

Information on which relationships should be included together with model

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RelationInclude<TState> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [children?](./state-model.relationinclude.children.md) | ImmutableArray&lt;Prop&lt;TState&gt;&gt; \| "all" | <i>(Optional)</i> Child properties that should be included. Set to 'all' to get all relationships |
|  [foreigns?](./state-model.relationinclude.foreigns.md) | ImmutableArray&lt;Prop&lt;TState&gt;&gt; \| "all" | <i>(Optional)</i> Foreign properties that should be included. Set to 'all' to get all relationships |
|  [prop](./state-model.relationinclude.prop.md) | Immutable&lt;Prop&lt;TState&gt;&gt; | The model property |
